content: this hat was designed as part of the 2021 crochet cancer challenge event 1 you can read about my inspiration for this hat and see a helpful photo tutorial by visiting my blog here https //purdysweetcrochet blogspot com/2021/10/flossies-feathers-crochet-cancer html 2 **size ** regular adult 21-22 head circumference pattern can be easily adjusted to accommodate a variety of size options **skill level ** intermediate **yarn ** approximate yarn usage is 250 - 300 yards for the slouchy hat and may vary depending on yarn weight hook size and gauge **hook size ** us size h/8 5 0 mm and i/9 5 5 mm crochet hooks **additional notes ** this hat is worked from the top down which makes it a bit easier to size the hat to your own personal gauge and includes directions for either beanie slouchy or beret style brim options are also included for a single_crochet band worked in the back loop or ribbed band worked in short row and slip stitched to the bottom edge of the hat facebook purdy sweet crochet 3 https //purdysweetcrochet blogspot com/ 4 1 https //sweetpotato3 com/2021-crochet-cancer-challenge-charity-crochet-event/ 2 https //purdysweetcrochet blogspot com/2021/10/flossies-feathers-crochet-cancer html 3 https //www facebook com/groups/2379015795705856 4 https //purdysweetcrochet blogspot com/
